sentences.sContent: Wear a T-shirt under your wet suit to stop it chafing.
sentences.sCn: 在潜水服里面穿一件T恤防止蹭痛皮肤。

remMethod.val: 在cafe中加了一个h(看作hot) → 热咖啡 → 擦热

words.tran: 擦热；使磨损；激怒（chafe的ing形式）

trans.tranCn: 擦热， 擦破； 激怒
trans.tranOther: if a part of your body chafes or if something chafes it, it becomes sore because of something rubbing against it
